name: Power Shovel
description:
## Power Shovel

Used for landscaping

You can craft a power shovel at the Workbench in the game.

## Supply

Unlimited

### Crafting Costs

---

- 2 Diamond
- 5 Gold
- 0.0625 SFL

[Link](https://docs.sunflower-land.com/player-guides/crop-farming#tools)
